thumb.title: 【ALYS】 SHARDS 【Original】 - Creep-P (Eyeris) (Reprint Youtube)
thumb.description: ALYS is the first Franco-Japanese virtual singer. It has been developed by VoxWave. She can be seem as a Vocaloid but i prefer say : Voxloid.More Infos on ALYS (EN): http://en.voxwave.fr/Come say Hi! on Youtube (EN and FR subtitles available on Youtube link) Youtube link: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=I43WoS1OOJs This song was made by Creep-P (Eyeris).SHARDS is ALYS second song in japanese and serve as a demo for her voice bank.
